aggAccountId.description: Account ID got from account service

captureKyc.description: flag to denote whether merchant kyc should be collected by UMAP of not

items.example: Voluptatem ab repudiandae tempora et omnis in.

items.example: Autem eveniet nihil qui et eaque ab.

products.description: payment modes allowed for merchants by an aggregator

status.description: Current status of the aggregator

validatePayoutAmount.description: flag to denote whether payout amount to be validated during other flows like refund or not

whitelistVpa.description: flag to denote whether merchant vpa has to be whitelisted on the NPCI side

amount.description: paise denominated value that needs to be collected from the user

createdAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp to indicate the creation date & time for the resource

currency.description: indicates the currency used during the transaction

expireAfter.description: expiry duration for the collect request in minutes

merchantReferenceId.description: reference id in the merchant's system

metadata.description: field provided for the merchant to add additional key-value pairs

status.description: status defining the validity of the collect request

transactionNote.description: note displayed to the customer at the payment page
